item.title: ‘Murderbot’ EP David S. Goyer on Why Stanley Kubrick’s ‘2001: A Space Odyssey’ Still Holds Up: ‘He Took All the Existing Rules of Film and Said “F— You”‘
item.description: Despite being made almost 60 years ago, Stanley Kubrick’s “2001: A Space Odyssey” still holds up. Its groundbreaking special effects inspired George Lucas, James Cameron, Christopher Nolan and more. T
